column1: * The Fourth Battles of Beleriand: Dagor Bragollach (Battle of the Sudden Flame). Morgoth breaks the Siege of Angband marking the end of Long Peace.
* The Ard-galen is destroyed by Morgoths rivers of fire and is renamed the Anfauglith
* Glaurung leads forth an army of balrogs and orcs. The Noldor suffer heavy losses and are scattered across Beleriand.
* Finrod is cut off from the rest of army in the Fen of Serech; he is saved by Barahir. Thereafter
column2: oaths are made between Barahir and Finrod and Barahir Ring of Barahir which becomes an heirloom.

column1: * Dorthonion is lost and its people remove to Hithlum. Celegorm and Curufin are defeated and flee to Nargothrond. Orcs capture Mount Rerir
column2: destroy Thargelion and defile Lake Helevorn; Caranthir removes to Amon Ereb.

column3: sends ships to Valinor to ask for aid. No aid comes and few ships return.
